alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Monroe (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 5:06PM EST until February 20 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New York... Oatka Creek At Garbutt affecting Monroe and Genesee Counties. For the Oatka Creek...including Garbutt...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oatka Creek At Garbutt. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Flood stage, general flooding of agricultural land begins, some basement flooding in Scottsville and Garbutt. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 6.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:00 PM EST Saturday was 6.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 6.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.2 feet on 09/09/2004. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 300 AM EST.
